sumOfItems.description: Sum of the inventory item price for the transfer

changedDate.description: Last changed date and time in ISO 8601 Z format

status.description: Status of the transfer.  New=Saved transfer but has not been submitted yet. In Transit=Items have been transfered and waiting for destination to recieve them.  Closed=All items have been recieved at destination.  Manufacturer transfer settings determine whether the status goes to In Transit or Closed on a Submit

ids.description: Comma-separated list of transfer IDs

catalogNumber.description: Catalog number of the item contained within a transfer

lotCode.description: Lot code of the item contained within a transfer

kitName.description: Name of the kit contained within a transfer

originBranchErpCode.description: Origin Branch ERP Code. Either originBranchId or originBranchErpCode is required. If both originBranchErpCode and originBranchId are provided, originBranchId will be used

destinationBranchErpCode.description: Destination Branch ERP Code. Either destinationBranchId or destinationBranchErpCode is required. If both destinationBranchErpCode and destinationBranchId are provided, destinationBranchId will be used

transferStatuses.description: Transfer status. Comma-separated list of case statuses. New = Saved transfer but items not transfered.  In Transit = Items transfered but waiting on destination to receive items.  Delivered = Some items have been received, but not all items.  Closed = All items have been received.

shipDateMin.description: Show transfers shipped after this date. All date times must be provided in YYYY-MM-DD format

shipDateMax.description: Show transfers shipped before this date. All date times must be provided in YYYY-MM-DD format

includeTransferItems.description: Include Transfer Item Details in response.  Default is false (Yes = true, No = False)

transferAction.description: Save creates transfer, but does not transfer items.  Submit saves and transfers the items. Manufacturer transfer settings determine whether the status goes to In Transit or Closed on a Submit

transactionId.description: WebOps transaction id associated with the transfer.

originBranchId.description: Origin Branch Id.  Either originBranchId or originBranchErpCode are required.  If both are provided, originBranchId will be used.

originBranchErpCode.description: Origin Branch ERP Code. Either originBranchId or originBranchErpCode are required.  If both are provided, originBranchId will be used.

originInventoryLocationId.description: Origin Inventory Location Id. Either originInventoryLocationId or originInventoryLocationErpCode are required.  If both are provided, originInventoryLocationId will be used.

originInventoryLocationErpCode.description: Origin Inventory Location ERP Code Either originInventoryLocationId or originInventoryLocationErpCode are required.  If both are provided, originInventoryLocationId will be used.

destinationBranchId.description: Destination Branch Id. Either destinationBranchId or destinationBranchErpCode are required.  If both are provided, destinationBranchId will be used.

destinationBranchErpCode.description: Destination Branch ERP Code. Either destinationBranchId or destinationBranchErpCode are required.  If both are provided, destinationBranchId will be used.

destinationInventoryLocationId.description: Destination Inventory Location Id. Either destinationInventoryLocationId or destinationInventoryLocationErpCode are required.  If both are provided, destinationInventoryLocationId will be used.

destinationInventoryLocationErpCode.description: Destination Inventory Location ERP Code. Either destinationInventoryLocationId or destinationInventoryLocationErpCode are required.  If both are provided, destinationInventoryLocationId will be used.
